{
  dataproduct(id: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"){
    datasets{
      id
      name
      dataproductID
    }
  }
}

RETURNS
{
  "data": {
    "dataproduct": {
      "datasets": [
        {
          "id": "{{ .dataset_id }}",
          "name": "Updated Name",
          "dataproductID": "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
        },
        {
          "id": "{{ .pii_dataset_id }}",
          "name": "DatasetWithPii",
          "dataproductID": "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
